column1: The  Petitioner  has  sought  a  Writ  of  Certiorari  to  quash  the  recommendation  of  the  1st
Respondent contained in P15 which the Petitioner argues is unreasonable. However, this
Court finds that there is no document marked as P15 in the docket. In prayer (d), (f) and
(g) the Petitioner is seeking a  Writ of  Certiorari to quash the decision to disqualify the
Petitioner for the promotion to the rank of Rear Admiral based on the AWOL charge and
the recommendation of the 1st Respondent regarding the Petitionerâ€™s promotion contained
in document marked as P15 respectively. As stated above in the absence of a document
marked  as  P15  whereby  it  is  alleged  that  the  Petitioner  has  been  informed  that  he  is
disqualified for the promotion due to the AWOL charge the prayer has to fail.
